    Methods in the_game that return Enemy
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Enemy[]
    Create.spawnEnemies()
    Create a Enemy array which contains all the enemies of this map.
    Can be upgraded to include an int parameter which would indicate which map to create (in case more maps are added to the game)
